accupressure.name: Accupressure
accupressure.description: [center]TODO - idfk bro - damage and something else maybe?.[/center]

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.description: [center]Gain 20 attack and deal damage to the user equal to HALF their max hp![/center]

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: [center]Bite for [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply possibly FLINCH.[/center]

bodyslam.name: Body Slam
bodyslam.description: [center]Slam your foe dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply 2 [color=green] Exposed[/color].[/center]

boneclub.name: Bone Club
boneclub.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to ALL enemies and possibly FLINCH.[/center]

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: [center]Toss a boomerang made of bone dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage [color=red]TWICE[/color].[/center]

bonerush.name: Bone Rush
bonerush.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage 2 to 5 times and possibly FLINCH!.[/center]

bugbuzz.name: Bug Buzz
bugbuzz.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to ALL enemies and apply [color=dimgray]DESPAIR[/color].[/center]

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply [color=red]1-4 BODY BLOW[/color]! User is [color=green]EXPOSED[/color] and [color=dimgray]DESPAIR[/color][/center]

cometpunch.name: CometPunch
cometpunch.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to an enemy 2 to 5 times![/center]

confuseray.name: Confuse Ray
confuseray.description: [center]CONFUSE an enemy and DOUBLE all DEBUFFS on them.[/center]

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to up to 4 RANDOM enemies and FLINCH![/center]

dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzypunch.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage. Leaves the user and enemy CONFUSED[/center]

dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to a target with SLEEP[/center].

firespin.name: Fire Spin
firespin.description: [center]Apply [color=orange]4 BURN[/color] to ALL enemies each turn for 3 turns MAX.[/center]

flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to an enemy. Damages the user slightly and [color=orangered]BURNS[/color] both.[/center]

flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashcannon.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to ALL enemies and apply EXPOSED![/center]

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to ALL enemies and apply [color=orange] 8 BURN[/color]![/center]

furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes
furyswipes.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to an enemy 2 to 5 times![/center]

groundandpound.name: Ground & Pound
groundandpound.description: [center]User gains [color=blue]10 BLOCK[/color] and applies [color=red]2 BODY BLOW[/color] to an enemy![/center]

gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to a RANDOM enemy 3 times.[/center]

helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.description: [center]Apply 7 ATKPWR to the target foe or ally.[/center]

highkick.name: High Kick
highkick.description: [center]Slam your foe dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply 2 [color=green] Exposed[/color].[/center]

hijumpkick.name: Hi-Jump Kick
hijumpkick.description: [center]Slam your foe dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply 2 [color=green] Exposed[/color].[/center]

hornattack.name: Horn Attack
hornattack.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to an enemy and SHIFT just as many times![/center]

hydropump.name: Hydro Pump
hydropump.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to an enemy and [color=red]10[/color] to adjacent enemies![/center]

icebeam.name: Ice Beam
icebeam.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and [color=aquamarine]1 CHILL[/color]. [color=red]SHATTER[/color] on [color=aqua]FROZE[/color] for [color=red]3X[/color] damage![/center]

icepunch.name: Ice Punch
icepunch.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and [color=aquamarine]1 CHILL[/color]. [color=red]SHATTER[/color] on [color=aqua]FROZE[/color] for [color=red]3X[/color] damage![/center]

karatechop.name: Karate Chop
karatechop.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to a foe and SHIFT them.[/center]

leaftornado.name: Leaf Tornado
leaftornado.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and SHIFT a random enemy [color=red]3X[/color]![/center]

leechseed.name: Leech Seed
leechseed.description: [center]SEED enemies causing them to [color=green]HEAL[/color] your team 3 each turn![/center]

leechlife.name: Leech Life
leechlife.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage then [color=green]HEAL[/color] for HALF the amount![/center]

lowkick.name: Low Kick
lowkick.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage [color=red]2X[/color] and apply [color=red]BODY BLOW[/color] each time![/center]

lowsweep.name: Low Sweep
lowsweep.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to ALL enemies and apply [color=red]1 BODY BLOW[/color]![/center]

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: [center]Only the devil himself knows what will happen.[/center]

nightshade.name: Nightshade
nightshade.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and add a copy to your DISCARD.[/center]

playrough.name: Play Rough
playrough.description: [center]Tussle with foes dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage [color=red]3X[/color] RANDOMLY and applying SHIFT![/center]

poisonsting.name: Poison Sting
poisonsting.description: [center]Sting your foe dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply [color=purple]2 POISON[/color].[/center]

ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.description: [center][color=red]TAUNT[/color] ALL enemies to target the user![/center]

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: [center]SHIFT a target TWICE with a mighty roar![/center]

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.description: [center]Toss your foe dealing [color=red]%s[/color] damage to target and [color=red]5[/color] more to nearby enemies![/center]

superpower.name: Super Power
superpower.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and apply HEADSHOT to target! Apply EXPOSED to the user.[/center]

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and [color=purple] 2 POISON[/color] to an enemy![/center]

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: [center]This attack does nothing but flop around - may SHIFT.[/center]

stringshot.name: String Shot
stringshot.description: [center]A pathetic move that MAY weaken enemies![/center]

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description: [center]Apply [color=red]10 ATKUP[/color] to the user AND an enemy. The enemy is also CONFUSED[/center]

takedown.name: Takedown
takedown.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to enemy and [color=red]3[/color] to the user unless [color=goldenrod]LEAD[/color].[/center]

thunderbolt.name: Thunder Bolt
thunderbolt.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to a RANDOM enemy and possibly [color=yellow]PARALYZE[/color]![/center]

triattack.name: Tri Attack
triattack.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage and inflict THREE random status effects.[/center]

watergun.name: Water Gun
watergun.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to target and [color=red]2[/color] to adjacent.[/center]

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: [center]SHIFT all enemies with a powerful gale.[/center]

zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon
zapcannon.description: [center]Deal [color=red]%s[/color] damage to ALL foes. [color=red]X2[/color] damage if [color=goldenrod]PARALYZED[/color][/center]
